about_the_game:
Food Croupier: Shuffle the Cards, Cook the Dish, Satisfy Your Customers!

Dive into an exciting simulation game where ingredient cards come to life as delicious meals! Food Croupier challenges you to create recipes, discover unique flavors, and creatively serve your customers. Each card represents a different ingredient, and finding the perfect combinations will take you one step closer to becoming a master chef.

With a mix of strategy and speed, you'll prepare dishes by combining cards while meeting the demands of your customers. Every successful meal unlocks new opportunities on your culinary journey.

Whether you're exploring new recipes, crafting inventive dishes, or perfecting your cooking skills, Food Croupier is the perfect choice for those who love creativity in the kitchen. Ready to embark on a flavorful adventure?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3550 / AMD R5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 8700K / AMD R5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 / AMD RX 6700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
